records.location_details: The incident occurred in Tychero, Evros, Greece. Four shots were heard from the Turkish side.
records.context_note: Four shots were heard on 12.05.2020 at 23:30 from the Turkish side. No Turkish Land Forces or other persons were observed. Greek authorities found it difficult to assess where the shots were fired from. The incident was reported by individuals in the area who heard the shots but were not directly affected.
records.evidence_quote: 4 (four) shots heard on 12.05.2020 at 23:30 from the Turkish side.

records.location_details: Two shooting incidents occurred in the Evros region of Greece, involving Turkish patrol boats.
records.uncertainty_note: Specific location within Evros is redacted.
records.context_note: Two new shooting incidents were reported in the same location in Evros, Greece, where a previous shooting incident had occurred. The first involved 2 gunshots at 14:40 from a Turkish patrol boat with three persons on board. The second involved 4 gunshots at 14:45 from another Turkish patrol boat with six persons on board.
records.evidence_quote: two new shooting incidents in Text Removed Justification 3, in the same location where shooting incident took place a few days ago: 1- 14:40 hours, 2 gunshots, from a Turkish patrol boat with three persons on board. 2- 14:45 hours, 4 gunshots, from another Turkish patrol boat with six persons on board.
